segments.text: I feel a sense of disgust looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing from the sink, spilling onto the floor, creating a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar, which is just wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting eagerly, her hand outstretched, encouraging his bad behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman doesn't notice the water or the children's mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so neat and tidy, but inside, it's a different story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a mix of negligence and bad behavior, and it's just unpleasant to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is just going to create more work for someone later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and puts a stop to this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this kind of laziness and lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
